General.Name: HYZON Motors Inc
General.Description: HYZON Motors Inc, a hydrogen mobility company, manufactures hydrogen-powered commercial vehicles and fuel cell systems. It focuses on developing medium and heavy-duty trucks, as well as city and coach buses. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Honeoye Falls, New York.
General.Address: 475 Quaker Meeting House Road, Honeoye Falls, NY, United States, 14472
